attributes.action: Legalise weed for over 21’s and allow dispensary’s
attributes.additional_details: This would help many people with mental illness such as depression and anxiety and also prevent drug dealers and people breaking the law where weed is concerned, if people had options out there I’m sure they would much rather have the option of legally obtaining marijuana then having to consider breaking the law
attributes.background: Legalise marijuana for over 21’s in small amounts and open dispensary’s so people can legally purchase it, sell licenses to dispensary’s to make sure they get only a pure product so no synthetic weed is sold.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575625
